pages.text:
Special Events
Make Memories to Last a Lifetime
Each season, you can experience something different when you visit Shimmering Lights at Sun Kissed Acres. We add on several light displays, create new themes. This year we’re starting with a Halloween-themed display!
Shimmering Lights is not a one-time experience, but rather a family tradition that brings new experiences every holiday!

Put our upcoming events in your calendar now, so you don’t miss out!
Christmas Shimmering Lights
Opening: November 26, 2021
Our winter event features a ¼ mile walking trail through the shimming lights dancing to music. Walk at your own pace and stop as often as you like. Enjoy Winterland full of blue and white lights, penguins, bears, old man winter and other favorite scenes. Don’t miss the Nativity scene and Star of David in our Religious area. Who can miss Santa and the reindeer in the Christmas area? Rest on one of the many benches conveniently placed along the trail or take selfies at one of our photo stops. Get in the holiday spirit with seasonal music and themed areas.
Be sure to wear good footwear as the trail can be uneven in spots. Sorry, it is not suitable for strollers or wheelchairs at this time. Remember to stay inside the light lines as bad things can get you on the outside of the lines. Seriously, it can be dangerous outside the lines with wires to trip on, rough terrain, tree roots and even a shallow creek nearby. We don’t want to lose any of our guests.
Didn’t get enough the first time through? Try it again and again—as many times as you like.
When you need a break, be sure to stop at our Holiday Village for light refreshments, watch a seasonal movie on our big screen, play some games or take pictures at our photo spot.

Warning:
Under Florida law, an agritourism operator is not liable for injury or death of, or damage or loss to, a participant in an agritourism activity conducted at this agritourism location if such injury, death, damage, or loss results from the inherent risks of the agritourism activity.  Inherent risks of agritourism activities include, among others, risks of injury inherent to land, equipment, and animals, as well as the potential for you to act in a negligent manner that may contribute to your injury, death, damage, or loss. You are assuming the risk of participating in this agritourism activity.
